definition: A discrete component or unit that is part of a larger whole, often used in the context of manufacturing, construction, or assembly processes. It refers to an individual piece or part that is distinct and separate from others, typically used to describe objects or items that are not complete on their own but contribute to the functioning or completion of a larger entity.

examples.german: Das Einzelteil passt nicht zum Rest des Geräts.
examples.english: The individual part does not fit with the rest of the device.

examples.german: Bitte überprüfen Sie jedes Einzelteil vor der Montage.
examples.english: Please check each individual part before assembly.

examples.german: Das Einzelteil ist in der Verpackung beschädigt.
examples.english: The individual part is damaged in the packaging.
Each individual part is carefully numbered.

examples.german: Das Einzelteil ist aus hochwertigem Material gefertigt.
examples.english: The individual part is made of high-quality material.
